about_the_game:
The Laser Games is a casual/competitive shooter, embracing the thrill and experience from real laser tag. Jump in with friends, strangers, or alone, and explore the various maps and challenges as you zap your way to the top! Play it your way- unlock and equip customizations, or contribute to the workshop with your own maps and gametypes!

Authentic Laser Tag

Whether you've played laser tag yourself as a kid, play competitively in tournaments, or have no idea what laser tag is, hop in and experience the thrill! Everything from the map style to the sounds and scorecards have been hand-crafted to recreate an authentic experience matching common laser tag places in real life.

Play Your Way

Want to try something new? The Laser Games has plenty to offer! Featuring traditional multiplayer gametypes like Team Tag Match and Free-For-All, as well as some unique gametypes like Tri-Flag and Payload Pusher, there's always a different way to play against other players, whether competitively or casually, and whether it's with official matchmaking or custom servers.

Want to challenge yourself, or go up against AI? The Laser Games also features custom match creation and singleplayer challenges with scoreboards, so you can play against the clock or against your friends, even if offline!

Express yourself in the game, with basic customizations all the way to theme packs that can alter the whole look of the game. Contribute your own content with official mod and workshop support, and play The Laser Games your own way, with your own dedicated server!

Fun For Everyone

By design, The Laser Games is quite simply, laser tag! This means you won't be shooting and killing other players, but rather tagging and earning points. Join us in a friendly environment made to let anyone have fun without the need of super gore and violence.

What are you waiting for? Download The Laser Games now and begin zapping away!

name: The Laser Games

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Due to the graphics demands of key gameplay elements (in-map mirrors),AI upscaling technology (FSR, DLSS, XeSS) are integrated in-game and recommended to use for optimal performance. Requirements subject to change as pre-release development continues
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Raytracing capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dedicated servers will likely yield different recommended requirements.

short_description: The Laser Games is a casual/competitive shooter, embracing the thrill and experience from real laser tag. An authentic experience, fun for everyone!
